meanings.definition: To draw a line under (a word or phrase) to give emphasis or indicate special type.
meanings.sent1: She likes to underline important words in her notes.
meanings.sent2: Please underline the key points in your essay.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally used a highlighter to underline the text.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her studies underlines her commitment to success.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to underline the main idea of the story.
